full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement
### File Number: W2037-25-0065/A

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the provision of hotel accommodations and support services in support of the Complex Terrain Leader Course. The purpose of this tender is to establish a Standing Offer agreement for a two-year period.

This notice is open to qualified entities who wish to provide hotel accommodations and support services. Bidders must demonstrate their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation.

Key Information:

* **Tender Type:** Standing Offer Request
* **Tender Location:** Alberta, Canada
* **Specific Locations:** within 10 km of Highway 1 between Canmore, AB, and Lake Louise, AB; or within 10 km of Dave Thompson Highway west of Nordegg town center and east of the Ice Field parkway (Highway 93) at the Saskatchewan Crossing.
* **Duration:** Two-year Standing Offer agreement

### Security Requirements

There are no security requirements associated with this tender.

### Intent of the Solicitation

The intent of this solicitation is to establish a Standing Offer agreement for the provision of hotel accommodations and support services to support the Complex Terrain Leader Course. The Standing Offer will be established for a two-year period and will include the option for renewal.

### Bidders' Inquiries

Inquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted to the Standing Offer Authority:

* **Name:** Iain FitzGerald
* **Email:** iain.fitzgerald@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (343) 572-4337

### Attachments

The tender documents are available for download at the following link [link to attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52557/w2037-25-0065_a---rfso-doc---en.zip)

### Languages of Communication

The solicitation will be conducted in both English and French. Bidder responses must be in the selected official language.
